titles: Answers for Colonel Sir John Hill, Lieutenant Colonel John Forbes, and John Forbes writer in Edinburgh. To the petition presented be [sic] Allan Cathcart, James Meinzies, and Thomas Hamiltonn, late captains of the said Colonel Hill's regiment.
